title: Vicksburg National Military Park: Bookstore
body: Bookstore                       NPS Photo  Operated by Eastern National, a cooperating association with the National Park Service, the bookstores at the Visitor Center and USS Cairo Museum allow visitors to enjoy one of the best selections of books, maps, DVDs, CDs, post cards, clothing, computer software, and other items relating to Vicksburg National Military Park, the Civil War, and associated National Park Service areas.   If you need assistance or would like to place an order, you can contact Eastern National by calling (601) 634-6286, or visit their website at http://www.eparks.com.       Eastern National Bookstore NPS Photo       Back to Park Visitor Center
